card_1.cardText:
> _aIf you rise on the wings of the dawn, if you settle on the far side of the sea, even if you go up to the heavens, even there His hand will guide you. His right hand will hold you fast and He will hold fast this great nation and the great beyond.a_

VP Mike Pence

card_10.cardText:
VP Pence uses Psalm 139 in closing remarks of his speech at the Pentagon announcing the process of creating the U.S. Space Force - the Space Force could be the 6th branch of the U.S. military (Air Force, Army, Coast Guard, Marine Corps, & Navy)

[view sources](https://smarthernews.com/18-08-09-qtd-mike-pence/)
